scripts.build: npm run build:happ -w happ && npm run build -w runtime
scripts.clean: npx rimraf 'target/**/build/*/out' target Cargo.lock flake.lock tests/**/target tests/**/Cargo.lock shared_crates/**/target shared_crates/**/Cargo.lock happ/zomes/**/target zomes/**/Cargo.lock workspaces/**/target workspaces/**/Cargo.lock && cargo clean
scripts.clean:ui: npx --quiet rimraf package-lock.json node_modules ui/node_modules ui/.angular ui/dist && npx --quiet rimraf tests/tryorama/node_modules
scripts.sweetest: npm run build:happ && npm run sweet:test
scripts.start: npm run build:happ -w happ && npm run start -w runtime
scripts.network: npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=4200 concurrently "npm run local-services" "npm run start:agent"
scripts.start:agent: HC_PORT=$(get-port) HC_ADMIN_PORT=$(get-port) concurrently "npm run launch:happ" "npm start -w ui"
scripts.launch:happ: hc s clean && echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/map-holons.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network -b http://127.0.0.1:54000 webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:55000
scripts.test-ui-ignore: AGENTS=1 concurrently -k "UI_PORT=1420 npm --prefix ui run dev" "npm run launch -w runtime"
scripts.sweetest:debug: export RUST_LOG=info && export WASM_LOG=debug && npm run build:happ && cargo test --manifest-path tests/sweetests/Cargo.toml -- --nocapture
scripts.sweetest:custom: RUST_LOG=${RUST_LOG:-warn} WASM_LOG=${WASM_LOG:-warn} npm run build:happ && clear && npm run sweet:test
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
